title: Narcotics Anonymous
description:
If you're an addict, NA can help

Narcotics Anonymous is a free, non-profit fellowship of people for whom drugs have become a major problem. NAâ€™s program is open to addicts of all ages, nationalities, cultures, creed, gender identity, and religions.

The only requirement for membership is a desire to stop using.

Narcotics Anonymous offers one promise to our members, FREEDOM from active addiction. We focus on the disease of addiction rather than any particular drug.

Our message is broad enough to attract addicts from any social class or nationality. When new members come to meetings, our sole interest is in their desire for freedom from active addiction and how we can be of help.
